page.title: 07EDUCATION IN WOODHALL SPA
page.content: {EDUCATION IN WOODHALL SPA} Education for the age group 3 to 18 is well catered for in Woodhall Spa. {Nursery Education:}The 3 to 5 year olds are able to attend a play school which accomodates 32 children for 3 hours on 5 mornings a week.A charge is levied on the parents. {Primary Education:}The school in Witham Rd.established in 1884,was closed in Dec.1968 when the present St.Andrew's C.E. primary school was fully completed.The first phase of this school being opened by the Bishop of Lincoln in 1962. {Secondary Education:}at 11 years,after tests,the children are selected by a panel of headteachers to go to either Horncastle Queen Elizabeth's Grammar School or Tattershall Gartree Secondary School.Many travel daily by bus to their respective schools.
